title: cafter
author: cafter
content: hello, indian bitcoiners after increase in popularity in crypto, i see regularly that big news channel videos are pops up in my youtube homepage, which is very attractive and clickable headings, after clicking and watching the video result were no information gained, they just waste time and earn money by youtube or any other way.when i was newbie very new to crypto i regularly searched for "crypto news today" in result of that search some informational videos are shown by youtube,but now searching that keyword all results are of big news channel like indiatoday,etc , do you think that these channels are helpful?but now i do not watch youtube for news just regularly check news site, and some times just watch coinbureau.ignore my bad english working on it

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on April 03, 2023, 02:30:01 PMhello, indian bitcoiners after increase in popularity in crypto, i see regularly that big news channel videos are pops up in my youtube homepage, which is very attractive and clickable headings, after clicking and watching the video result were no information gained, they just waste time and earn money by youtube or any other way.when i was newbie very new to crypto i regularly searched for "crypto news today" in result of that search some informational videos are shown by youtube,but now searching that keyword all results are of big news channel like indiatoday,etc , do you think that these channels are helpful?but now i do not watch youtube for news just regularly check news site, and some times just watch coinbureau.ignore my bad english working on it Dude please never create any topics without giving paragraph the importance. A paragraph would only help you in the future. I understand you have applied for a signature campaign but that won't happen if you create a topic in such manner. You need to make it more professional like I did while replying you. Adopt and innovate is the mantra for you and for everyone who comes to our loved Indian board.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: QuoteDude please never create any topics without giving paragraph the importance. A paragraph would only help you in the future. I understand you have applied for a signature campaign but that won't happen if you create a topic in such manner. You need to make it more professional like I did while replying you. Adopt and innovate is the mantra for you and for everyone who comes to our loved Indian board. thanks, for your advice, i will post in a good manner and good content, i was promoting the signature campaign which is paused thanks for telling me

comments.author: elevates
comments.body: Please do not think the reply by @pakhitheboss was negative. This is how you might grow up ranks. Considering you recently applied for a signature campaign. You learn, evolve and then you become a high-ranking influencer. Best of luck mate!
